Body:
manga = Manga('dragon-ball', 'pdf')
manga.volumes = [1, 2]
assert manga.volume[1] == Volume(number=1, file_path=
    '/tmp/dragon-ball/dragon-ball_volume_1.pdf', upload_path=Path(
    '/dragon-ball/dragon-ball_volume_1.pdf'))
assert manga.volume[2] == Volume(number=2, file_path=
    '/tmp/dragon-ball/dragon-ball_volume_2.pdf', upload_path=Path(
    '/dragon-ball/dragon-ball_volume_2.pdf'))
assert len(manga.volume) == 2
